alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 8:41PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Bernard, southeastern St. Charles, east central Lafourche, Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 945 PM CDT... At 841 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Violet to near Galliano. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cut Off, Galliano, Marrero, Harvey, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Larose, Gretna, Westwego, Golden Meadow, Jean Lafitte, Woodmere, Violet, Terrytown, Lafitte, Poydras, Myrtle Grove, Estelle, Shell Beach and Barataria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.
